txt.en:
'Word has recently arrived from Garrun that our scouts have discovered that the caverns beneath the Isendale are much more extensive than previously thought. They run west beneath Dol Baran and north to Nan Curunír. Hopefully, Saruman will deal with the beasts, but in the event they prove too overwhelming, our people must be warned.

'Bring word to Ardwyn at Forthbrond, [placeholder]. He will know what to do.'
'These words are among the most terrifying you could bring to me, [placeholder]. We must warn Grimbold at the Ford of Isen and send word to Théodred at once!'
Word has arrived from Garrun that Rohirrim scouts have discovered that the caverns beneath the Isendale are much more extensive than previously thought.
Ardwyn is at Forthbrond, far to the north of Innoth's camp.\n\nInnoth instructed you to bring news of the Orc-caverns to Ardwyn.
